pages.text: Super Curios are ascended versions of your existing arsenal, upgraded using a new material known as $(l:misc/ascension_essence)Essence of Ascension$(/l). These curios have their own designated slot, and cannot be equipped in standard curio slots (not even the otherwise all-purpose curio slot type). Additionally, do not attempt to equip a super curio alongside its inferior variant. It will not go well.
